===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|i}} – a position on the forearm where the pulse can be palpated by compressing the [[w:radial artery|radial artery]]. It is called [[寸口]] in modern Chinese and the meaning of a unit of measurement is derived from the distance between the wrist and this position. Compare [[手]], [[九]], [[爪]].
